Browser Chrome

Styles the viewer window to look like a web browser when the composition is running. Click the downloads button to stop the viewer. The back and forward buttons are accessible through the Browser Buttons patch.

Browser Chrome

  • Enable
  • Window Title
  • URL
  • Favicon
  • Enable Back
  • Enable Forward

Usage

Inputs

Enable

Enable or disable the restyling of the Viewer window

Window Title

Set the title of the Viewer window to match your website's title

URL

URL to display in the Viewer window's address bar

Favicon

Connect an Image to this port to set the favorites icon of the browser UI

Enable Back

Enables or disables the Back button to be clicked

Enable Forward

Enables or disables the Forward button to be clicked

Outputs
